description:
Keroro takes over the directing of a movie about the platoon, to the disaster of all involved!  And then, Keroro finds out about a legendary movie coming back to a theater, and he and Fuyuki go into the city to watch it together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, I`m A Director! / Keroro & Fuyuki, Small Adventure in a Big City
ケロロ 我輩は監督ぢゃよ! / ケロロ&冬樹 大都会の小さな冒険
